Hi! My name is **Julio Trecenti** (aka [Data Janitor](https://www.instagram.com/faxineirodedados/))

I'm a Statistician with PhD's at [IME-USP](https://www.ime.usp.br/pos-estatistica/){target="_blank"}, Brazil

#### Experience

I do a lot of things!

- Assistant professor at [Insper](https://www.insper.edu.br/pos-graduacao/programas-avancados/data-science-e-decisao/){target="_blank"}
- Post doctorate researcher at [Unifesp](https://ceoe.org.br/){target="_blank"}
- Tech Director at [ABJ](https://abj.org.br){target="_blank"}
- Partner at [Terranova Consulting](htps://trnv.com.br){target="_blank"}
- Teacher at [Curso-R](https://curso-r.com){target="_blank"}

#### Main interests

- Jurimetrics, Web Scraping and Neural Networks
- R language (I use Python if needed)
- Open Data and Open Science
